question: How many Rijksmonumenten (national heritage sites) are there in Leeuwarden, Netherlands?
asked_question_translated: Koľko Rijksmonumenten (národných kultúrnych pamiatok) sa nachádza v meste Leeuwarden v Holandsku?
answer: V meste Leeuwarden v Holandsku sa nachádza približne 800 Rijksmonumenten.
answer_translated_eng: There are approximately 800 Rijksmonumenten in Leeuwarden in the Netherlands.
